ops.description: Bank[6][17] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count
Bank[6][17] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:4, type:6, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // {GRAY}{Cloud}
“Everything is white…”{PAUSE}{GRAY}“What did I do?
I don't remember anything…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // {GRAY}“My memory…since when?
If everything's a dream, don't wake me.”
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // Sephiroth
“I'm far superior to the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“I became a traveler of the Lifestream and
gained the knowledge
and wisdom of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“I also gained the knowledge and wisdom of those
after the extinction of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“And soon, I will create the future.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Sephiroth
“Ha, ha, ha…I wonder?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“As long as we have this,
Sephiroth won't be able to use Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Cloud}
“Can you guys use it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cloud}
“You mean lots of spiritual energy?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“He shouldn't be able
to find the Promised Land.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Cloud}
“…I gave the Black Materia
to Sephiroth?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // {Cloud}
“Wha…what did I do?
Tell me, {Aeris}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
“Urrrrrrgh…
What have I done!?”
climbLadder({x:-16, y:669, z:-1106, triangleId:103, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:6, facingDirection:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“Nope, we can't use it right now.
You need great spiritual power to use it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Aeris}
“That's right.”{PAUSE}“One person's power alone won't do it.”{PAUSE}“Somewhere special.
Where there's plenty of the Planet's energy…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Aeris}
“Sephiroth is different.
He's not an Ancient.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Aeris}
“I won't let you do it!
The future is not just yours!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}, are you all right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}…
you haven't done anything.”{PAUSE}“It's not your fault.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“Hey!
I'll keep watch here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}, what are you doing!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Red XIII}
“I'll be sittin' out here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Red XIII}
“{Aeris}, are you all right!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Cid}
“I'm gonna have a smoke out here!”{PAUSE}“Ahhh!!
It's really something, having a smoke
at a place like this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // {Cid}
“{Cloud}!
What the hell are you doing!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Yuffie}
“Heh heh…this looks majorly boring,
so I'll stay here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // {Cait Sith}
“Oops!
This looks like a bad time!”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cait Sith} No. 2.
Right pleased to meet you all!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:56}); // {Cait Sith}
“Oops!
This looks like a bad time!”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cait Sith} No. 2.
Pleased to meet you all!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}!!
What are you doin'!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Vincent}
“I'll be looking around here.”
fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:2}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:11, g:64, b:32, speed:64, type:60}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Sephiroth
“…Ah, but I have.”
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:4, speed:8});
fadeScreen({r:11, g:240, b:240, speed:240, type:30}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:11, g:64, b:32, speed:64, type:60}); // unused=0

fadeScreen({r:11, g:250, b:250, speed:250, type:30}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:11, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:200}); // unused=0

ops.description: fadeScreen({r:11, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:200}); // unused=0
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // Got Key Item "Black Materia!"

dialogStrings:
{Yuffie}
“Heh heh…this looks majorly boring,
so I'll stay here.”

{Cid}
“I'm gonna have a smoke out here!”{PAUSE}“Ahhh!!
It's really something, having a smoke
at a place like this.”

{Cloud}
“As long as we have this,
Sephiroth won't be able to use Meteor.”

{Aeris}
“Nope, we can't use it right now.
You need great spiritual power to use it.”

{Aeris}
“That's right.”{PAUSE}“One person's power alone won't do it.”{PAUSE}“Somewhere special.
Where there's plenty of the Planet's energy…”

{Aeris}
“Sephiroth is different.
He's not an Ancient.”

{Cloud}
“He shouldn't be able
to find the Promised Land.”

Sephiroth
“I'm far superior to the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“I became a traveler of the Lifestream and
gained the knowledge
and wisdom of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“I also gained the knowledge and wisdom of those
after the extinction of the Ancients.”{PAUSE}“And soon, I will create the future.”

{Aeris}
“I won't let you do it!
The future is not just yours!”

{Cloud}
“…I gave the Black Materia
to Sephiroth?”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}…
you haven't done anything.”{PAUSE}“It's not your fault.”

{Cid}
“{Cloud}!
What the hell are you doing!?”

{Cait Sith}
“Oops!
This looks like a bad time!”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cait Sith} No. 2.
Right pleased to meet you all!”

{Cait Sith}
“Oops!
This looks like a bad time!”{PAUSE}“I'm {Cait Sith} No. 2.
Pleased to meet you all!”

{GRAY}{Cloud}
“Everything is white…”{PAUSE}{GRAY}“What did I do?
I don't remember anything…”

{GRAY}“My memory…since when?
If everything's a dream, don't wake me.”
